org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.dao

Class TokenManagementDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.dao.TokenManagementDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenManagementDAO

    public class TokenManagementDAOImpl
extends Object
implements TokenManagementDAO
    Data Access Layer functionality for Token management in OAuth 2.0 implementation. This includes storing and retrieving access tokens, authorization codes and refresh tokens.
